Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of mainnet merge is still pending due to issues related to execution layer's (EL) readiness for the transition from proof-of-work to proof-of-stake consensus mechanism.


Several tasks were accomplished, including a review of the current state of EL and CL implementations by both teams, as well as discussions on how to improve communication between them.
